                     java.lang.String password,
                     java.lang.String email,
                     java.lang.String gender,
                     java.lang.String key)
        Parameters:
        username - ; The Name of the current user
        password - ; A (Hmac-SHA512) hashed version of the user's password; this password can't ever be retrieved in normal form
        email - ; The current user his mail
        gender - ; The current user his/her gender
        key - ; The automatic generated hash secret key

        Parameters:
        username; - The user's username; this has to be a registered username
        password; - The user's password; this has to be exactly the same as the registered password
        Returns:

      • SHA512_encoder

        public java.lang.String SHA512_encoder(java.lang.String value,

        Parameters:
        value; - password combination unXORed with the hascode (created by getPassword())
        secretkey; - the secret key provided by the client
        Returns:
        returns a perfectly fine API hash which is ready to be send as a header request
